AirServer 4.5.2 – Stream audio, video and photos via AirPlay

AirServer is a Mac application that adds AirPlay/AirTunes audio, video, photo, slideshow and mirroring receiving capabilities to your Mac. With AirServer you can now receive audio, videos, photos or slideshows from any AirPlay compatible application running on your Mac, PC or iOS device. WHAT,S NEW Version 4.5.2: Revert to 720p mirroring resolution on displays with less… Read More »

Growl 2.0 – Notification system for OS X apps

Growl is a notification system that allows any application to send it a notification, and then it displays it. You can (for example) be notified that you have new email, or that a download completed.
